verses.verse: Hurry,<WH430> God, to deliver<WH5337> me.<WH2363> Come quickly to help<WH5833> me,<WH3068> Yahweh.
Let them be disappointed<WH954> and confounded<WH2659> who seek<WH1245> my soul.<WH5315> Let those who desire<WH2655> my ruin<WH7451> be turned<WH5472> back<WH268> in disgrace.<WH3637>
Let them be turned<WH7725> because<WH6118> of their shame<WH1322> Who say,<WH559> "Aha!<WH1889> Aha!<WH1889>"
Let all those who seek<WH1245> you rejoice<WH7797> and be glad<WH8055> in you.<WH157> Let those who love your salvation<WH3444> continually<WH8548> say,<WH559> "Let God<WH430> be exalted!<WH1431>"
But I am poor<WH6041> and needy.<WH34> Come to me quickly,<WH2363> God.<WH430> You are my help<WH5828> and my deliverer.<WH6403> Yahweh,<WH3068> don't<WH309> delay.
